title: Help protect your child against flu. For parents of primary school children.
description: The flu vaccine is recommended for:  all primary school children (vaccine given at school)  all children in Scotland aged 2 to 5 years, and not yet in school (vaccine given at their GP practice).
cleaned_text: Help protect your child against flu. For parents of primary school children. by Public Health Scotland published on 2016-02-17T13:57:28Z The flu vaccine is recommended for: all primary school children (vaccine given at school) all children in Scotland aged 2 to 5 years, and not yet in school (vaccine given at their GP practice). Genre public health scotland
